tH3s539qYeAXp6VNJ.name: Terraphobia (Ground)
tH3s539qYeAXp6VNJ.notes: You are afraid of the ground, and are uncomfortable even seeing it.  If there's a chance of an actual fall from height, self-control rolls are at -5.
